original_title: ពេជ្រមិនទាន់ឆ្នៃ
overview: A man visits the countryside from the city and realizes that the girl he had just met happens to be his cousin who lives in the countryside and is his soon to be fiance. Since the two dislike like each other, they both come up with a plan in order to avoid the arranged marriage by their parents.
title: Pich Min Tonn Chnai
